plot: A man marooned on a South Seas island finds himself fighting off attacks by a native tribe and falling in love with a native princess.
title: John Tobin's Sweetheart
plot_es: A man marooned on a South Seas island finds himself fighting off attacks by a native tribe and falling in love with a native princess.
plot_en: A man marooned on a South Seas island finds himself fighting off attacks by a native tribe and falling in love with a native princess.
